name: Lunar Bastion
description:
GitHub : https://github.com/ACB-prgm/GameOffGameJam_LunarBastion

Highly recommend the downloaded versions. (idk how it's even working in browser)

********* HOW TO PLAY *********

Use the tabs on the left to build turrets, call in ordnance (mortars and health kits), and upgrade turrets and your base.  You can press H to hide/unhide the tabs.

To have a turret or ordnance shot over from earth's space cannon, select the corresponding tab, click the turret/ordnance you would like shot over, then select the position you would like to have the turret/ordnance delivered to.   You will be prompted to hit enter, and the space cannon will launch over the reinforcements.

To Upgrade, click the upgrade tab and then click on the item you would like to upgrade on the map.  Click on a turret to see its upgrade, and click on the base itself to see the base upgrades, such as increasing ordnance damage and drill speed.

Last as long as you can!  Your time is shown in the top right and will be saved once you return to the title screen so you can leave the game page and it will be stored.

Please let me know of any bugs you may discover!

———————————————————————————————————

DESCRIPTION

I did not get to finish much of what I had set out to do with this game in terms of features and polish (scope creep got me), but I was able to make a fully functional and really rather fun game to play!
